reviewText: What a great dvd! Lots of information given for each state & done in a fun way. My Quads love watching this DVD over & over!

I had an older version of this so I am hoping this one is slightly more up-to-date.  The video is full of state trivia, and the students love to guess the state before it is given.  Great review of the 50 states and capitals!
My third grade class loves it! It was a great culmination to our state unit. A lot of interesting information about each state.
I am a High School history teacher and this movie was a lot of fun as well as being an educational tool!
